issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When using Hyperloop Android a classic Titanium project (non-Alloy), the metabase is not only generated to build/hyperloop but also to Resources/android. This should *never* happen, because developers store their application logic there and all generated files should stay in build/.
fields.summary: Hyperloop: Android - Generated metabase is copied to /Resources/android in classic projects

comments.body: Closing, as this will be fixed with TIMOB-24829.
